org.javasimon.console
Class SimonConsoleFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.javasimon.console.SimonConsoleFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.Filter
public class SimonConsoleFilter
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter

Simon Console filter does the same as SimonConsoleServlet and provides just an alternative way to include embeddable console in your applications. Putting this filter before the Simon Servlet filter is also the easiest way how to avoid monitoring of the console itself.

Since:
2.3
Author:
Richard Richter

doFilter

public final void doFilter(javax.servlet.ServletRequest servletRequest,
                           javax.servlet.ServletResponse servletResponse,
                           javax.servlet.FilterChain filterChain)
                    throws IOException,

Wraps the HTTP request with Simon measuring. Separate Simons are created for different URIs (parameters ignored).

Specified by:
